title: Texas man files wrongful death suit against women he claims aided ex-wife's abortion
description: A Texas man has filed a wrongful death lawsuit against three women he claims helped his then-wife obtain abortion medication.

title: WV legislators OK transgender care ban with health exemption
description: Adds mental health exemptions to ban on some health care for transgender youth.

title: Jehovah's Witnesses shocked by Hamburg attack, thank police
description: There was a deadly shooting at one of the group's halls in Hamburg, Germany.

title: 3D-printed rocket remains grounded after more launch aborts
description: The rocket is made almost completely of 3D-printed parts.

title: Marathon standoff underway after shootout between deputies, barricaded suspect
description: A standoff following a shootout between deputies and a barricaded suspect in a Los Angeles County residence has been ongoing for over 21 hours, authorities said.

title: Burning eyes, dead fish; red tide flares up on Florida coast
description: Concerns rise that it could continue to stick around for a while.

title: Israelis protest proposed legal changes for 10th week
description: Tens of thousands of Israelis demonstrated against the contentious plan.

title: More than 40 vehicles involved in highway pileup in Hungary
description: Police say the collision involved five tractor-trailers and 37 other vehicles.

title: State advises against traveling to Mexico during spring break
description: Texas authorities are advising residents to avoid traveling to Mexico during spring break "due to the ongoing violence throughout that country."

title: Oregon eyes mandate for climate change lessons in schools
description: Only one other state requires a climate change curriculum.

title: US agencies debunk Florida surgeon general's vaccine claims
description: Florida’s surgeon general made false claims about COVID-19 risks.

title: Bud Grant, stoic coach of powerful Vikings teams, dies at 95
description: He took the Minnesota Vikings to four Super Bowls in eight years.

title: Coroner: Death of former Ohio AMBER Alert infant unexplained
description: His death was ruled due to “sudden unexplained infant death.”

title: California river breaches overnight, residents urged to evacuate immediately
description: As California faces heavy rainfall and flooding, the Pajaro River levee was breached overnight. Restoration efforts will resume on Saturday.

title: Aches, rashes and fear: Trauma remains after Ohio derailment
description: Headaches, congestion, itchy skin rashes — and fear

title: Maine college goes into lockdown after shot fired on campus
description: The campus of a liberal arts college in Maine was put on lockdown early Saturday after a shot was fired in a student housing complex during what one student called a massive annual party

title: After 15 years in prison, two wrongfully convicted men granted scholarships
description: After 15 years in prison, they look forward to beginning their new lives.

title: Indonesia’s Merapi volcano spews hot clouds in new eruption
description: Indonesia’s Mount Merapi has erupted with avalanches of searing gas clouds and lava, forcing authorities to halt tourism and mining activities on the slopes of the country’s most active volcano

title: Bomb kills 1, wounds 5 at press award event in Afghanistan
description: Police in Afghanistan say a bomb has exploded during an award ceremony for journalists in Mazar-e- Sharif city, killing at least one person and wounded five others

title: Records in Fox defamation case show pressures on reporters
description: Documents from a defamation lawsuit against Fox News illustrate the pressures its journalists faced in the weeks after the 2020 presidential election

title: New Air Force One will stay blue and white, Biden decides
description: President Joe Biden is sticking with a blue-and-white color scheme for the exterior of the new version of Air Force One

title: West Virginia Senate passes modified transgender care ban
description: West Virginia’s Republican supermajority Senate passed a bill Friday that would ban certain health care for transgender youth

title: Hong Kong activists behind Tiananmen vigil jailed for months
description: Three former organizers of Hong Kong’s annual vigil in remembrance of victims of China’s 1989 crackdown on pro-democracy protests have been jailed for four and a half months for failing to provide authorities with information on the group in accordance...

title: Bill would ban marriages under age 16 in West Virginia
description: A bill addressing child marriage in West Virginia has passed the state Senate

title: New Hampshire lawmaker arrested for obstructing snowplow
description: A Republican lawmaker in New Hampshire was arrested Friday for allegedly screaming and swearing at a snowplow truck operator who recorded the confrontation and later reported him to police

title: Texas women sued for wrongful death after aiding in abortion
description: Three women in Texas are being sued for wrongful death by a man who claims they helped his now-ex-wife obtain medication for an abortion

title: Quake swarms at neighboring Alaska volcanoes raise concerns
description: Not one but two volcanoes on the same island in Alaska’s Aleutian chain were showing signs of unrest on Friday, rocked by seismic activity

title: WATCH:  Security footage shows defendant escaping from court
description: A murder suspect attempted to escape an Oregon court room after sheriff's deputies removed his shackles and is now facing additional charges of first-degree burglary and second-degree escape.

title: Canadian police investigating alleged Chinese 'police stations' in Quebec
description: The Royal Canadian Mounted Police have identified two alleged Chinese police stations in Quebec and are investigating them.

title: 2 LA police officers shot by parolee released from hospital
description: Two Los Angeles police officers shot by a wanted parolee have been released from the hospital and a third is in stable condition
